# videoGravity

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates how the layer displays video within its bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
var videoGravity: AVLayerVideoGravity { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVLayerVideoGravity] defines the supported video gravities. The default value is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVLayerVideoGravity/resizeAspect].

## Configuring the layer

- **isReadyForDisplay**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the first video frame is ready for display.
- **controlTimebase**: A timebase that determines how the layer interprets timestamps.
- **AVLayerVideoGravity**: A structure that defines how a layer displays a player’s visual content within the layer’s bounds.
